metadata.description: A fun look for all ages at the incredible world of insects by your "host", Irving. Using illustrations from a number of illustrators in a humorous way, Irving gives tid-bits of fascinating information about the insects that live in the world around us. Did you know that mosquitoes have 47 teeth? That some of your favorite candy is actually crushed up beetles (especially the red ones)? A perfect introductory book for all ages and kids will enjoy the sometimes zany approach to the artwork.
metadata.name: Irving's Icky Insects
